meanings.definition: Modern or new in style or character.
meanings.sent1: The neoteric design of the building stood out among the traditional architecture.
meanings.sent2: Her neoteric fashion sense always impressed her friends.
meanings.sent3: The neoteric smartphone had so many features, it was like a tiny computer in your pocket.
meanings.sent4: The neoteric approach to problem-solving revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The neoteric art exhibit left a lasting impression on all who attended.

meanings.definition: A person who advocates new ideas or methods.
meanings.sent1: As a neoteric, she was always pushing for innovative solutions to old problems.
meanings.sent2: The neoteric presented his groundbreaking research at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The neoteric's enthusiasm for change was infectious among his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: She was a neoteric in the field of technology, always ahead of the curve.
meanings.sent5: The young neoteric inspired a new generation of thinkers with his bold ideas.
